title: Solving for $$x$$
text: Solve the first equation for $$x$$ and then substitute the resulting expression into the second equation.

title: Solving for Zeroes
text: Expand the equation and set it equal to zero.

title: Subsituting Each Y Value
text: Next, substitute each value for $$y$$ into the first equation to solve for $$x$$. Always substitute the value into the linear equation to check for extraneous solutions.

title: Verifying the Solution
text: The solutions can be verified by subsituting these (x,y) values into both of the original equations.
